Hablamos de su tiempo viviendo en Asia y las similitudes que tiene con latinoamÃ©rica, como fue su experiencia trabajando en Rappi, y algunos de los desafÃ­os y ventajas de un sindicato de inversiÃ³n. Este episodio es completamente en inglÃ©s y espero que lo disfrutes mucho.

In this episode, I spoke with Ali Jamal, Partner at First Check Ventures. First Check Ventures is an angel syndicate that invests in early-stage startups around the world. The syndicate has supported and invested in startups in more than 25 countries, making more than 100 investments and deploying more than $25 million since its launch. We talked about his time living in Asia and the similarities it has with Latin America, such as his experience working at Rappi, and some of the challenges and advantages of an investment syndicate. This episode is completely in English and I hope you really enjoy it.Â
